home.title: Tamagochi
home.subtitle: Your Electronic Child
home.description: Experience parenthood simulation: upload photos (yours and your partner's, or even a celebrity or friend's), fill out a questionnaire for each parent, and watch your AI-generated child grow, learn, and interact with you.
home.step1Text: Create your account and upload photos/videos of both "parents" — you and your partner, or you and a celebrity/friend to see what your child would look like. Fill out a short questionnaire for each parent (traits and characteristics).
home.step2Text: Our AI creates a model of your future child — combining facial features and personality traits from both parents' questionnaires.
home.step3Text: Your child lives in the app: they grow, develop, communicate, and express emotions based on their age, personality, and what you teach them.
home.feature1Text: AI-generated child face combining features from both parents, with age progression over time.
home.feature2Text: Your child's personality develops based on parent traits and interactions, expressed through emotions and behavior.
home.feature3Text: Chat with your child using AI. Their responses adapt to their age, personality, and what they've learned from you.
home.feature4Text: Watch your child progress through different life stages, learning new words and skills as you teach them.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Sign in to your account
login.errorServer: Failed to connect to server. Make sure the backend is running.

register.title: Parent Registration
register.subtitle: Tell us about yourself — this will help create your electronic child
register.successText: Thank you! Your account has been created. Redirecting to login...
register.errorValidation: Please enter email and password (at least 8 characters).
register.errorServer: Failed to connect to server. Make sure the backend is running.

onboarding.intro: Let's create your electronic child. We need a few things from you.
onboarding.uploadDesc: Upload several photos (and optionally videos) of both parents. This helps AI generate your child's appearance.
onboarding.yourTraitsDesc: Tell us about yourself (parent 1). This helps determine your child's base personality.
onboarding.partnerTraitsDesc: Tell us about the second parent (partner, friend, or celebrity). Use defaults if you prefer.
onboarding.errorSubmit: Failed to save data. Please try again.

dashboard.comingSoon: Your dashboard is coming soon. Here you'll see your electronic child once it's created.
